league Settings:
    
    - Create members/Admin tab

    Admin Mode:
        - Not including in game scoring
        - limit setting access

    Custom Stats:
        - clear info after adding
        - add edit Stat
    
New player entries:
    - make basic company type home page
    - when first register go to specific intro description page
    - when join new league auto refresh page (to make league appear) and go to new league home page

    - make score solid object
    - make points vs rounds winning
    - no rounds tracking player stats (Ten)
